name: Advanced Night Repair Holiday Skincare Set
about: What it is:A set with captivating skincare formulas to elevate your glow, significantly reduce the look of lines and wrinkles, and reignite your radiance..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid (serum and eye cream): Locks in moisture..What Else You Need to Know:Advanced Night Cleansing Gelée washes away impurities from skin’s surface. Advanced Night Repair Serum helps skin look radiant. Revitalizing Supreme+ Creme significantly improves the look of skin’s firmness. Over time, Advanced Night Repair Gel-Creme noticeably reduces the look of dark circles..This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL Advanced Night Cleansing Gelée with 15 Amino Acids (travel size)

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Step 1: Morning and night, massage Advanced Night Cleansing Gelée gently over damp skin..-Rinse thoroughly with warm water, avoiding eye area..-Step 2: Apply Advanced Night Repair Serum morning and night on clean skin before your moisturizer..-Step 3: Apply Revitalizing Supreme+ Moisturizer on clean skin after your serum..-Step 4: Apply Advanced Night Repair Eye Supercharged Gel-Creme morning and night around the eye area.
